Hello,
I have setup a webhook with a PrivateApp which is triggered when a deal status changes.
My issue is that I am trying to validate the request is coming from HubSpot using the `X-HubSpot-Signature-V3` header as described on <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/apps/authentication/validating-requests#validate-the-v3-request-signature>
My endpoint is an AWS API Gateway and I was wondering if anyone has had experience in implementing this?

My setup is using AWS CloudFront with multiple origins
One of the origins as the API Gateway for HubSpot
I have a CloudFunction that injects the secret as a header and passes it to the API Gateway. And I have a CustomFunction authorizer to check that the signature matches.
Is this the best way to do this?
